article_title: 'The Daily Show' Breaks Down Each GOP 2016 Hopeful's 'Last Ditch Strategy To Win Over Iowa'
article_text:
Comedy Central's "The Daily Show" used its Twitter account once again to provide commentary as many of the Republican presidential hopefuls took part in a debate.

Recognizing the event was the GOP field's last gathering before the Iowa caucuses, "The Daily Show" released a series called "The Last Tryowa," detailing each candidate's "last ditch strategy to win over Iowa."

Things got rolling with Sen. Ted Cruz (R-Texas):
